p.codeblock: public abstract int setBeautyEffectOptions(boolean enabled, BeautyOptions options);
virtual int setBeautyEffectOptions(bool enabled, BeautyOptions options) = 0;
public abstract int SetBeautyEffectOptions(bool enabled, BeautyOptions options);

section.p: Enables or disables image enhancement, and sets the options.

Enabling the image enhancement function involves a series of method calls. The calling sequence is as follows:
Call (agora_video_process) during initialization to integrate the video enhancement dynamic library in the project.
Link the extension library in the project file: AgoraVideoProcessExtension.xcframework
Link the extension library in the project file: AgoraVideoProcessExtension.framework
Call (libagora_video_process_extension.dll) during initialization to specify the extension's library path.
Call (agora, beauty, ) to enable the extension.
Call to enable the video module.
Call this method to enable the image enhancement function.

ul.li: Agora has updated the Agora image enhancement algorithm from v3.6.0 to enhance image enhancement effects and support sharpness adjustment. If you want to experience optimized image enhancement effects or set the sharpness, integrate the libagora_video_process_extension.so dynamic library into the project before calling this method.

Agora has updated the Agora image enhancement algorithm from v3.6.0 to enhance image enhancement effects and support sharpness adjustment. If you want to experience optimized image enhancement effects or set the sharpness, integrate the AgoraVideoProcessExtension.xcframework dynamic library into the project before calling this method.

Agora has updated the Agora image enhancement algorithm from v3.6.0 to enhance image enhancement effects and support sharpness adjustment. If you want to experience optimized image enhancement effects or set the sharpness, integrate the libagora_video_process_extension.dll dynamic library into the project before calling this method.

section.note: This method only applies to Android 5.0 or later.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the image enhancement function:
: Enable the image enhancement function.
: (Default) Disable the image enhancement function.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED(4): The system version is earlier than Android 5.0, which does not support this function.
